name: Shinjuku Hearts
description:
An adult visual novel set in the bustling city of modern Shinjuku, Japan.

Follow the misadventures of a spirited, young local man named Guy as he pursues the hearts of various girls.
See their erotic and tender moments with an immersive soundscape to put you into the scene.

- Discover a quirky, lovable cast of characters
- Hand drawn, detailed uncensored scenes
- Branching story lines with multiple endings
- Full English text
- No unlock or level requirements to access erotic scenes
- No unnecessary, time wasting game mechanics
- No micro-transactions, paywalls or censor patches
